an5.164:1.1: Tatra kho ayasma sariputto bhikkhu amantesi …pe…
an5.164:1.2: pancahi, avuso, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu alamsajivo sabrahmacarinam.
an5.164:1.4: Idhavuso, bhikkhu attana ca silasampanno hoti, silasampadakathaya ca agatam panham byakatta hoti;
an5.164:1.5: attana ca samadhisampanno hoti, samadhisampadakathaya ca agatam panham byakatta hoti;
an5.164:1.6: attana ca pannasampanno hoti, pannasampadakathaya ca agatam panham byakatta hoti;
an5.164:1.7: attana ca vimuttisampanno hoti, vimuttisampadakathaya ca agatam panham byakatta hoti;
an5.164:1.8: attana ca vimuttinanadassanasampanno hoti, vimuttinanadassanasampadakathaya ca agatam panham byakatta hoti.
an5.164:1.9: Imehi kho, avuso, pancahi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu alamsajivo sabrahmacarinan”ti.
